abstract.para: Uludag project aims at developing an operating system distribution based on the Linux kernel and the accompanying open source/free software applications. The distribution targets the desktop user in the first stage.

orderedlist.listitem: To develop a widely used operating system distribution,
To establish a sustainable organization to develop this distribution,
To contribute to the open source/free software community through this distribution and the surrounding development ecosystem.

sect1.title: The Uludag operating system

orderedlist.listitem: Will provide full and sound Turkish support,
Will be easy to install and use,
Will have a human-centric task-based modular structure.

sect1.para: The conceptual preparation for the Uludag project dates back to Spring 2003. The project gained momentum with the formation of Uludag Development Team in early 2004. The first desktop version of the distribution is going to be released by the end of 2004, which will be followed by the server version and others shortly.
